description: Get a random dad joke whenever you need a quick laugh. Search jokes by keyword or pull up a specific favorite. Add lighthearted humor to chats, demos, and prototypes in seconds.

capabilities.name: get_random_joke_tool
capabilities.description: Get a random dad joke from icanhazdadjoke.com

capabilities.name: search_jokes_tool
capabilities.description:
Search for dad jokes by keyword or phrase.

        Args:
            term: Search term to find jokes
            limit: Number of jokes to return (default: 5, max: 30)

capabilities.name: get_joke_by_id_tool
capabilities.description:
Get a specific dad joke by its ID.

        Args:
            joke_id: The ID of the joke to retrieve
